A standard recursive algorithm for determining eveness:

```{r}
is_even <- function(n = integer()) {
  stopifnot(rlang::is_scalar_integerish(n), n >= 0)
  if (n == 0) {
    return(TRUE)
  } else if (n == 1) {
    return(FALSE)
  }
  is_even(n-2)
}

x <- 1:100


```
